fehd.ADR_EN: OUTLET 1 & 2 AT G/F, 1/F (PORTION), 2/F (PORTION) & 3/F (PORTION) OF REGAL RIVERSIDE HOTEL AND THE OUTSIDE SEATING ACCOMMODATION AT SHOP FRONT AT, 34-36 TAI CHUNG KIU ROAD, SHA TIN, NEW TERRITORIES
fehd.ADR_TC: 新界沙田 大涌橋路34-36號 麗豪酒店1-3樓部份 及地下1、2號店及露天茶座

geocode_en.formatted_address: 34-36 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: 34-36 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 34-36 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.name: Regal Riverside Hotel

reviews.text: Fairly nice hotel in Sha Tin. Located right by a major bus stop, which makes transit easy! The A41, with direct service to the airport stops right in front as well, which is MUCH cheaper than any other airport option. If you can get the breakfast option included with your booking for a tad more, do it! Their breakfast buffet was TOP NOTCH!

Price good. Attentiveness good. Location was fit for purpose. Working class neighborhood,  no tourist amenities. Breakfast is better experienced outside this hotel. Bus stop A41 outside hotel. MTR a little walk away.

The room was clean and spacious - three beds made room for, my husband, and our grown daughter. It was noisy at night so I didn't sleep well, but the beds had some softness which is not always common in Asian hotels. Two metro looked are near enough for conveniently accessing anywhere in Hong Kong. We were specifically looking to stay in the New Territories and liked the vibe. However, it's a long way to other parts of Hong Kong, often 4 train transfers to get where we were going. But I'd recommend the hotel.

Staff are very helpful. It can be quite crowded during weekends because of tourists from nearby places coming in groups. Very convenient as there are convenience stores nearby and City Center Mall is just 1 bus station away.
My room was so nice. It was much bigger than I expected. The view of the river was nice as well. Though the breakfast variety was limited, I still enjoyed my stay.

result.adr_address: 34, 36 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 34, 36 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.name: Aventi Pizzeria

reviews.text: Taste good and fair price
Very delicous and acceptable prices
Good pizza size and base, but did not include the extra toppings requested and paid for, tomato sauce was a bit weak, and the toppings that were there were not evenly spaced

Plenty of new immigrant waitresses here, who have no idea how to serve in a non-Chinese restaurant. I had my plates and drinks practically thrown on to my table. Guests here were very noisy as well.

This place is basically a Chinese restaurant. Save your money and time, and go elsewhere.
Good coffee

result.name: 麗豪廳

reviews.text: Taste good and fair price
不知所謂既酒店自助餐

reviews.author_name: some one live in the past
reviews.text:
係酒店食野略貴預左
但係某一男主管態度不敢恭維
係呢餐飯剩下既回憶
服務追唔上酒店水準，在泳池旁邊負責燒海鮮的同事，不願意為客人翻熱海鮮，致使燒烤溫度不足。
很久沒有到這裡。

result.vicinity: 34, 36 Tai Chung Kiu Road, Sha Tin

result.adr_address: 34-36 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 34-36 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.name: 沙田麗豪酒店

reviews.text:
Sneering, insulting staff treat you like you're little Oliver Twist asking for more gruel.

Here's a short list. Day 0 fresh room: toilet leaks loudly, faucet leaks, mini fridge door doesn't close. How can you check a guest into a broken room?!

 Day 2 onwards, no replacement mini soap after room service, have to call house keeping to beg for more. 

Asked for a plastic bag: "I've only got old and used ones though, still want it?" 

Asked if there was a business centre to print something : "What's your room number?
Oh. It's for executive guests only. Why don't you go buy a coffee at a shop somewhere and use theirs." 

Asked for more pillows: "you have other rooms under the same booking. Ask them for their extra pillows."

Prepare to be spoken to like a pauper if you need the staff for anything at all.

The washroom grouting badly needs replacing and the room needs new paint 10 years ago. 

They're next to the Border. I'm sure they mostly get guests from the mainland who the staff are used to bullying and sneering at freely without consequences. It's built a habit in them, I guess. They probably have a staff prize pool for most cutting remark. I don't need to stay at the fanciest places, but I think it's basic right for guests to not be talked down to. 

Come and stay at the newer swanky exec suites if you're not Asian looking. But for these prices why would you choose this dump? 

0/10 would not recommend.

It’s the worst 4 stars hotel i ever see. The bad service, the bed equipments, the drawer is broken. The floor is not clean, i just don’t understand why the hotel can get the 4 star. 
The buffet is very expensive and bed taste.
Good food
Getting worse due to too many Chinese tourists crowded in recently. Maybe servers themselves got very bore and impatient.
Good food

result.vicinity: 34-36 Tai Chung Kiu Road, Sha Tin

result.adr_address: 香港沙田大涌橋路34-36號
result.name: 沙田麗豪酒店

reviews.text: 從未住撚過咁撚柒差嘅酒店，一間房如同垃圾房，換咗一間，凌晨3點幾壞空調，都算撚數，諗住訓醒再算，點知一直喪咳。頂唔閪撚住，叫個服務員搞搞佢。個師傅一入撚到黎，一邊打開個蓋，一邊係度DLLM。。成四點幾，我都當聽唔撚到，費撚事同佢吵，一陣吵醒隔離左右，咪影閪撚低我啲質素囉，岩唔閪撚岩啊！！請你好好放低。。
極之不專業的服務態度，什麼都懶得理，做任何事，都裝作看不見，裝作沒有看見客人。
服務態度不是很好,但是要求的服務倒是有做;雖然房務人員給你的感覺是愛理不理,但是房間基本清潔都有做;自助早餐有點失望,並不覺得花這筆費用有值得,來住此間飯店的旅客建議去外面覓食.但是下次不會再來住了,雖在大馬路上有公車,也雖然有河岸步道,但河上卻會飄來惡臭魚腥味.但是外地來的旅客需要是飯店人員的熱忱協助,畢竟我們不是香港人呀.

Sneering, insulting staff treat you like you're little Oliver Twist asking for more gruel.

Here's a short list. Day 0 fresh room: toilet leaks loudly, faucet leaks, mini fridge door doesn't close. How can you check a guest into a broken room?!

 Day 2 onwards, no replacement mini soap after room service, have to call house keeping to beg for more. 

Asked for a plastic bag: "I've only got old and used ones though, still want it?" 

Asked if there was a business centre to print something : "What's your room number?
Oh. It's for executive guests only. Why don't you go buy a coffee at a shop somewhere and use theirs." 

Asked for more pillows: "you have other rooms under the same booking. Ask them for their extra pillows."

Prepare to be spoken to like a pauper if you need the staff for anything at all.

The washroom grouting badly needs replacing and the room needs new paint 10 years ago. 

They're next to the Border. I'm sure they mostly get guests from the mainland who the staff are used to bullying and sneering at freely without consequences. It's built a habit in them, I guess. They probably have a staff prize pool for most cutting remark. I don't need to stay at the fanciest places, but I think it's basic right for guests to not be talked down to. 

Come and stay at the newer swanky exec suites if you're not Asian looking. But for these prices why would you choose this dump? 

0/10 would not recommend.
今天11點的時間我預定機場接駁，我來那麼多次，每次都是問我航班幾點，幫我安排時間，這次我一樣講時間，他是在兇什麼的問我是要幾點的！你們作業系統可不可以統一一點！
